content:
Samsaarichaanupamakallaal
Jagatheerakshakanaam naathhan
Kaantan thanne kaantayoda-
Ngethirelppaan deepam peri
/tnirgatharaayoru kanyakallo-
/tdoppam paartthaal svargamahaaraajyam
Mungi nidrayilellaarum pongi appozhaaraavam
Vannu manavaallan-arivullllorarayil kayari
Arivattoraa vaathilkkal thengi thengi
/tpralapichayyayyo ninnu

Ekan puthran pithyavachanam
Drshdaantangalle nirmmichaan
Paaram dhanamullllonekan
Vaanaan muzhuki kshematthil
/tkottukazhippaan kothi poondon
/tparamadaridran-mattoruvan laasar-
Mrthiyil vaanavarabrahaam
Thaathan thanmadiyil chertthaan
Jeevan vittappoll-dandanamelppaan poyu dhanavaan-
Anyarilaardratha kaattaatthon-narakam thannil-yaathanayettaanenneykkum

Eeshaa! Naathhaa! Varika thunappaan villi koottunnu
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkallmel krpacheyyenam

Maalodaathmam chollunnevam paapam cheyyum
Mumpullllaaraasaundyaryamenikkaarinneki
Anpudayonaamudayonennetthallllunnaakil
En saundaryam thirikettharuvaanaarundaakum

Raajnyeeroopam poypoyollaamaathmaave! Vaa!
Nin saundaryam rakshithamallo nin naathhangkal
Neeyetthumpoll vaagdatthampol nalkum vegam
Veendum ninne bharamelppippaan kaakkunneeshan

Devaa! Devaa! Uttharamarulli kaarunyam che-
Thekeedenam manujaathmaakkallkkanuthaapam nee
